law.catch_line: Duty of Auditor at end of term.
law.text: Upon his resignation or the expiration of his term of office, the Auditor shall, with the aid of the Secretary of State, make an inventory of the books, furniture and stationery belonging to the office, file the inventory in the Office of the Secretary of State, and deliver the books, furniture and stationery to his successor.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 141.
